title: ‘The Mandalorian,’ ‘Mank,’ and an Interview With ‘A Teacher’ Creator Hannah Fidell
description:
Chris and Andy break down the latest episode of ‘The Mandalorian’ and make some predictions for where the rest of the season will go (1:00). Plus, their review of ‘Mank’ (23:09) and an interview with ‘A Teacher’ creator Hannah Fidell (42:39).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Hannah Fidell
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
